name: TU
body:
### Welcome to Tiny Utils.
This is just a bunch of command-line utils (currently only one though :) ) to help in some development tasks.

## grep
No need to type `grep -r something app lib spec` to find some text, just run:

```
$ tu g something
```

And it will run grep in most common directories of rails app.

### Authors and Contributors
Made by @adie
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
